Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":622642,"totalDownVotes":47557,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":63864,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"ğŸ”µğŸ”´ UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! ğŸ”´ğŸ”µ
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3787516,"totalDownVotes":312289,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":57563,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

Collect and trade hundreds of knives!

ğŸµ ìŒì•… ì¶œì²˜: https://twitter.com/LawnReality"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":189554,"totalDownVotes":31056,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":8822,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.

Controls:
1-9 = Activate/Deactivate your weapon.

Q = Punch/Kick, gives a single experience point.
T = Block, duration increases based on Durability.
M = Equip/Unequip Mask
Click = Attack
E = Special 1
R = Special 2
F = Special 3
C = Bonus Special
0 = Arata (CCG Team)
G = Kakuhou Special/Quinx
Double tap (W/A/S/D) to evade.

Do not trust any other 'Ro-Ghoul' copies on roblox! Those games may threaten your account! Be safe out there (:

cash drop takes 30%
